text: In the java world, we use objects. Objects are born and die. we can decide when an object creates and when an object dies. When we decide…
title: Sofia Vergara’s Casual Saturday Night Included Parrots Mermaids and Her Modern Family Co-Stars

twitter.description: Saturdays look a lot different at the Vergara-Manganiello household than what we’re used to. Sofia Vergara shared snaps and Instagrams from her lavish Memorial Day bash at her home……
